snippet.title: Block Buster PS1 Gameplay (Phoenix Games)
snippet.description:
In this video i test out Block Buster by Phoenix games on the sony plystation 1! Its a simple arkanoid clone but one that quite playable and enjoyable! Ive always been a fan of these type games but most lack in playablility, but Block Buster has enough to keep you entertained for quite some time. 
Theres plenty of levels to get through and enough variety to eep coming back for more, so its a game that id reccomend if you like these simle puzle type games!

Please leave a comment down below if youd like to see more, and please dont forget to subscribe if you havent already.
